fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
~ Drive to Excel (2-shot): Target a player during the night. If they are not an Agent, you will know. If they are an Agent, you will give them a buff depending on their type:
-Head: They will gain one shot of Identify Contact
-Killing: Their next attack will be both Powerful and Astral. If they try to kill an Agent, they will instead fail and gain a permanent chat with that Agent.
-Support: They become permanently control, redirect, and roleblock immune
-Sabotage: They become permanently detection immune and can choose a disguise role
-Communication: You will gain a private chat with them.
This can only be used once per Agent.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: ~ If you are lynched, you will signal to the Agents. You will be able to send a 400 character message that only Agents will see.
